oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pension Application for Mrs. Mary L. Vandagriff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pension Application for Mary L. Vandagriff, wodow of Jacob Vandagriff, who was a Pvt., Co. A, 6th Reg't. TN Mtd. Inf. Document says she is entitled to a pension at the rate of Twelve dollars per month to commence April 20, 1915 and to continue during her widowhood.
